text_overlay: Not all glass work is equal. Here's what sets ours apart.

caption.story: When a villa owner in Emirates Hills came to us after a shower enclosure installed by another team started leaking within eight months, we knew exactly what had gone wrong — and exactly how to fix it. Our specialist glass team, led by Rajeev with over a decade of precision fitting experience, doesn't just install glass. They engineer it. Every seal, every bracket, every measurement is done in-house, on-site, by the same hands from start to finish.
caption.detail: Here's what our Glass & Aluminium Works actually includes that many teams skip: precision-templated measurements before a single panel is cut, anti-corrosion aluminium profiles rated for Dubai's humidity, silicon sealing applied in controlled layers — not rushed in one pass — and a full fit inspection before we hand back your space. No subcontractors. No handoffs. No surprises. From AED 45,000.
caption.cta: If your villa has glass that isn't performing the way it should — or you're planning a new shower enclosure, balustrade, or partition — let's talk. WhatsApp us for a free consultation and a 48-hour quote: https://wa.me/971526455121
